tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_manager VARCHAR(100),
    project_status ENUM('Planned', 'In Progress', 'Completed')
);

CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingProjects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    architect_name TEXT,
    construction_company TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectTeam (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_id INT REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id),
    team_lead TEXT,
    team_member TEXT[]
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectTasks (
    task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_id INT REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ProjectTasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_assignee VARCHAR(100),
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES GreenBuildingProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TaskComments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_text TEXT,
    commented_by VARCHAR(100),
    task_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES ProjectTasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Project_Tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_status VARCHAR(20),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Green_Building_Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Project_Documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(50),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Green_Building_Projects(project_id)
);
